The target audience is city residents.
The value proposition is providing fresh, locally-grown produce to every city resident.

breakdown.analysis: The future state is a world where every city resident has access to fresh, locally-grown produce.
The key differentiator is providing sustainable urban farming solutions.
The ultimate outcome is a healthier and more sustainable food system for metropolitan areas.

values.description: This is shown by the company's focus on building sustainable urban farming solutions.
This is shown by the company's goal of providing fresh, locally-grown produce to every city resident.
This is shown by the company's emphasis on technological innovation in urban farming solutions.

goals.goal_name: Deploy 50 vertical farms in 5 major cities by 2030
